attachments.title: Fly Through The Solar System At The Speed Of Light With This Video
attachments.text: Space is really, really big, and thereâ€™s been a couple of great videos out there that show off the relative size of objects. This video puts the scale of the solar system into real perspective by showing how it takes you pass through at the speed of light.
